title: EUNE Connection problems
body:
"Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server."

I've had this problem for a week and it's starting to get really frustrating. None of the Riot's methods https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues  seem to work. Connecting with VPN software to EUNE and without it to EUW works, indicating the problem is at EUNE's end. Is there an upcoming fix to this?

replies.body:
I'm just playing on EUW atm, made an account already lvl 10, sigh.. higher ping, lost all my champs, runes etc. ( can't even play the feature modes)
I don't think they'll fix it for months, if ever.
No one knows. This problem is a never ending story. Probably.
They probably have resources to do something about it. But they seem inefficient. First world problems... {{item:3151}}

This is something we're currently looking into, and your specific issue will require a [ticket submission](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our Tech Team will be able to help with this on an individual basis.
